::blacknighmare::

She come in and stared along side to killfest and Darkmouse

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> She opened her link as she walked onto the bridge. "Hey,Drillbit. 
Can 
> you come to the bridge. I got something for you."
> 
> She closed her link and went to the small cabinet that was under 
> KitKat's computer console.  She took out a small box and set it on 
> the console.  She sat down at her station and tapped a few 
buttons.  
> She brought up the codes the main data bases and to autodefence 
> systems.  She was accessing other programs. But what she wasn't 
going 
> to give Killfest the codes to access the missles and long range 
> rockets untill they had taken care of KitKat properly.
